text: Interstate 220 (I-220) in Louisiana is an eastâ€“west bypass route around Shreveport, Louisiana. It runs from I-20 and LA 3132 in Shreveport to a second interchange with I-20 in Bossier City. The highway serve as a northern bypass of the downtown area for through traffic traveling on I-20. ==References== Category:Interstate Highways
title: Interstate 220 (Louisiana)
